column1: [[File:Michael Tolkien.jpg|thumb|Michael Tolkien at [[The Return of the Ring]]
'''Michael George Reuel Tolkien''' (b. [[11 January]] [[1943]]) is the grandson of [[J.R.R. Tolkien]]
column2: being the eldest son of [[Michael Tolkien|Michael H.R. Tolkien]].  Michael was born in [[Birmingham]]
column3: raised in a rural community in the Chiltern Hills
column4: and then moved several times due to his father's changes of employment.

column1: Michael is a poet and author of several books.  He retired in 1994 due to ill health.  He has been married three times since 1967 and has two daughters
column2: Catherine and Ruth.  Michael is a member of the board of the [[Tolkien Estate]].

column1: ** ''The making of modern children's literature: J.R.R. Tolkien'' (review)

column3: Exile and Beyond" [Speech at the Tolkien Society's Annual Dinner 1998]
